title: Black Ambrosia
description: Angelina is a killer. You'd never know it to look at her — until you look into her eyes. Angelina doesn't kill out of hatred or fear — she kills out of love, bringing solace to her victims, guided by the seductive Voice that speaks only to her. Angelina offers you eternal peace — at the cost of your soul! Listening Length: 8 hours and 50 minutes.
author: Elizabeth Engstrom
